overview: Filmed in various locations (such as Sony Recording Studios, The Hit Factory, D&D Studios, Flava Unit Records and The Brick City Nightclub), this roof-raising collection gathers a series of electrifying performances by some of rap and hip-hop's biggest and best stars, including Lil Kim, Jay Z, 50 Cent, Big Pun, DMX, Mos Def, The Lox and many more.
title: Shades of Hip Hop: Resurrection
